backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - v2 with full GUTT documentation context (same as Claude/Ollama)
original_prompt: Track all my important meetings and flag any that require focus time to prepare for them.

gutts.name: Retrieve Calendar Events
gutts.capability: Access and fetch all scheduled meetings from the user's calendar
gutts.user_goal: Ensure the system has the complete list of upcoming meetings
gutts.evidence: Implementation calls to Google Calendar API or Microsoft Graph to pull event data

gutts.name: Identify Important Meetings
gutts.capability: Analyze fetched meetings and determine which ones are marked or inferred as important
gutts.user_goal: Distinguish important meetings from regular ones
gutts.evidence: Priority tagging logic based on event metadata or user-defined rules

gutts.name: Extract Meeting Context
gutts.capability: Parse meeting details such as title, agenda, participants, and duration for context
gutts.user_goal: Gather contextual information needed for preparation assessment
gutts.evidence: Parsing event descriptions and extracting agenda items from calendar entries

gutts.name: Determine Preparation Requirement
gutts.capability: Assess whether a meeting requires dedicated focus time based on its context and importance
gutts.user_goal: Identify meetings that need preparation before attending
gutts.evidence: Model or rule engine that flags meetings with complex agendas or high-priority participants

gutts.name: Flag Meetings Requiring Focus Time
gutts.capability: Mark or annotate meetings that need preparation in the system
gutts.user_goal: Visually or programmatically indicate which meetings require preparation
gutts.evidence: Adding a 'requires focus' tag or label to the calendar event

gutts.name: Notify User of Preparation Needs
gutts.capability: Send alerts or reminders to the user about meetings that require focus time
gutts.user_goal: Ensure the user is aware of and can allocate time for preparation
gutts.evidence: Push notification or email alert about flagged meetings
